title: Rampaging goat named Peter leaves a path of destruction through the streets of Sydney
text:
A goat has been captured by police after rampaging down a suburban street in western Sydney.

Police were called to Guildford Road on Sunday morning after reports a shop front had been smashed in.

Once on the scene, officers found a goat running amok in front of businesses on the footpath.

A goat (pictured) has been captured by police after rampaging down a suburban street in Western Sydney

The goat, named Peter, was captured by officers with help of bystanders. How the animal got there remained a mystery.

But when officers began calling the RSPCA, a man arrived, claiming the goat was his and had escaped from his backyard.

The man took him by the horns and packed him into the back of his car to take Peter back home.

No charges have been laid.
description: A goat has been captured by police after rampaging down a suburban street in Western Sydney.
authors: Jackson Barron For Daily Mail Australia
